title: CLUB PENGUIN TAKES A HIT
content:
Well, a user named "Wolf Blade" thought it was a virus but Club Penguin has been:

* Logging you off at un known times, (NO this is not the 10 min. dissconnect it says "Lost connection" but it happens to everyone at the same time!

*A user can look like another!
Its a bug were a 2 people are there and it says its a certain penguin but its someone else, (Yeah, this one is confusing)___________________________________________
[url=http://greenftechn.com/brandon]greenftechn.com/brandon[/url]
-proud member of the "tough guys wear pink" society-
[img]http://greenftechn.com/brandon/images/tough_guys_wear_pink.gif[/img]

title: ck
content:
Well, they found out. The "Wolf Clan"
(im in it)
Reported the bug and clubpenguin is temporarily disabled,
(1 hour) [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img]

EDIT: in case you wanted to know it says :

Sorry

Club Penguin is currently experiencing technical difficulties. We will be back in 1 hour.

- Club Penguin Development Team
